verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse: 1
I bring my best praise
And I'm ready to give it all to You
I bring my whole heart
And I'm ready to pour it out on You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Pre Chorus:
I bring my energy and passion
You're worthy of nothing less
Your love is stirring me to action
So I'm gonna give my best

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
I give my all to You
'Cause You are worth it, Lord You deserve it
I give my all to You
All of my passion, my heart's reaction
You have it all, You have it all, You have it all
You have it all, You have it all, You have it all

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Interlude:
You have it all
You have it all

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Verse: 2
I bring a new song
And I'm gonna sing it out to You
I bring a fresh love
And I'm trading the old in me for new

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
PreChorus:
I bring my energy and passion
You're worthy of nothing less
Your love is stirring me to action
So I'm gonna give my best

verse.name: c4
verse.lines:
Chorus:
I give my all to You
'Cause You are worth it, Lord You deserve it
I give my all to You
All of my passion, my heart's reaction
You have it all, You have it all, You have it all
You have it all, You have it all, You have it all

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Interlude:
You have it all
You have it all

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
As I praise and lift Your name
The walls come down
I celebrate, Your freedom reigns
The walls come down

verse.name: c5
verse.lines:
Chorus:
I give my all to You
'Cause You are worth it, Lord You deserve it
I give my all to You
All of my passion, my heart's reaction
You have it all, You have it all, You have it all
You have it all, You have it all, You have it all

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Interlude:
You have it all
You have it all
You have it all
You have it all
